title: Full-Time UX/UI Designer
job_overview:
We’re looking for a UI/UX Designer to join our team full-time. If you have a strong eye for detail and a passion for clean, user-friendly design, this role could be a great fit.

What You’ll Do:
- Apply UI/UX design principles to create intuitive, high-quality user experiences.
- Work on web and app design projects from concept to final execution.
- Collaborate on design systems and contribute to maintaining a consistent brand identity.

What You’ll Bring:
- Proven experience in UI/UX design.
- Solid background in web and app design.
- Familiarity with building and maintaining design systems.
- A good understanding of brand identity work.
- Proficiency in Figma and the Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.).

Basic Requirements:
- Fluency in English.
- Strong attention to detail.
- Willingness and ability to learn quickly.
- Preferred availability: Monday to Friday, 16:00 to 00:00 Philippines time.

A designer portfolio and resume are required as a part of your application.
Please send your resume and a portfolio to Upgrade to see actual info
